product.product_title: Motorola Moto e13 64 GB, 4 GB RAM, Creamy White, Mobile Phone
product.product_description: With The All-new Moto E13, You Can Enjoy Advanced Capabilities With Up To 4 Gb Of Ram And Cruise Through A Hectic Day With Ease. Store Everything You Love And More With 64 Gb Of Storage Thats Expandable Up To 1 Tb. Equipped With A Powerful Unisoc T606 Processor, Youll Get A Performance Like Never Before. Scroll, Stream, Search, And Socialise With A 5000mah Battery That Lets You Watch Videos For Up To 23 Hours, Listen To Music For Up To 225 Hours And Browse Your Favourite Social Media Platforms For Up To 21 Hours. Additionally, With A Premium Design And A Sleek Body, Its Sure To Make Some Heads Turn. Take Your Theatre To-go When You Have A 16.5 Cm 6.5 Ultra-wide Screen Ips Lcd Screen And Dolby Atmos That Gives You Unmatched Entertainment.

product_attributes.Features: Smartphone, With Expandable Storage, Water Resistant

offer.shipping: Delivery date and cost shown at checkout

reviews_sample.review_text:
Absolutely love this phone, bought as a replacement for my previous Motorola which managed to survive 7+ years of my best efforts to kill it.

First off, it was easy to buy with a prompt delivery. Out of the box it was already 75% charged and just required a simple insertion of my nano SIM before switching on. A quick boot-up followed with some straightforward configuration options all completed in a matter of minutes before it was ready to go; I particularly liked the option of choosing a browser (I chose Brave amongst the many others). It's bigger than expected with a 6.5" screen so doesn't fit as easily in my pocket as previous but on the plus side means a better view when watching videos or sport.

Initial switch on is quick, shutting down quicker and general browsing and alternating between apps is quick, surprisingly quick at this pricepoint.

The camera takes some lovely pics, phone calls are clear including VOIP ones, weight is fine, "feel" of the phone is pleasant with buttons and on screen keyboard having positive feedback and action.

After having charged the phone to full which didn't take long at all, 48 hours later it's still over 80% charged. Admittedly I don't use mobile data unless I have to (just wi-fi most of the time) so those permanently online might notice a quicker discharge - so far the battery life lives up to its claims.

An interesting point to note is that thought the specification states it's 4G only I made a call which connected on 3G as well which I'm not technical enough to understand but perhaps this phone does more than stated.

All-in-all I am very, very pleased and would recommend this to anyone requiring something easy to use at an economic price, lovely jubbly :)

product_highlights: 4 GB RAM | 64 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB
